item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“manuelq, post:3, topic:527578”][quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=646332.msg4346547#msg4346547 date=1375965620]
I like the advertisement besides that I see nothing that would make me join feature wise. Good luck.
[/quote]
maybe thats because u saw 1 % of the whole server ;][/quote]What I am getting at is that the entire point of an advertisement is to make people to join. The pictures you show has no significance compared to the other 718’s/whatever.

You need to show unique content that will draw players in.

There is a good guide on how to do this at:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
